DOC.brief_summary: Prospectively monitor the patients receiving the Oxford Partial knee arthroplasty
DOC.brief_title: Outcome Analysis of the Oxford Partial Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.detailed_description: Utilization of systematic outcome measurements and specific designated time frames to monitor patient satisfactions will assist in analysing this type of prosthesis and the post operative period. Data collected will be added to the compiled information from previous studies in relation to the Oxford knee.
